generation_triggers: Every proven architectural pattern in production
Every yielded PREY8 chain that advanced the work
Every passing gate, every green test
Every reusable recipe card, every mosaic tile

artifacts.title: P4 SINGER OF STRIFE AND SPLENDOR — Songs of Splendor: Patterns, Buffs & Dual Token System
artifacts.bluf: The definitive formalization of SPLENDOR. It defines the YIN aspect, the bardic buffs that log every success, and the dual token system.

artifacts.title: P4 SINGER OF STRIFE AND SPLENDOR — Character Sheet
artifacts.bluf: The STRIFE (YANG) companion to E67. Essential for understanding the complete Singer.

artifacts.title: P4 SINGER OF STRIFE AND SPLENDOR — Aeshkrau Illumian Sonic Mage
artifacts.bluf: Formalizes the Singer as an Aeshkrau Illumian whose sigils manifest as accumulated tokens.

artifacts.title: THE HFO PANTHEON — D&D 3.5e Divine Rank 0 Character Sheets
artifacts.bluf: The 8 HFO Legendary Commanders ported to D&D 3.5e as Divine Rank 0 PCs.

artifacts.title: P4 RED REGNANT — Attractor Basin Identity Persona
artifacts.bluf: Defines the Red Regnant at 13 levels of abstraction, from L1 (constants) through L13 (incarnation).

artifacts.title: Divine Identity Guarantees Behavior: Why Epistemic Incarnation Is Upstream of Rules
artifacts.bluf: The conceptual incarnation thesis proving that divine identity does not need rules.

artifacts.title: REFERENCE_HFO_EMPOWERED_RALPH_WIGGUMS_LOOP_V2 (The Phoenix Protocol)
artifacts.bluf: The 12-phase strange loop where P4 kills, P5 resurrects P6 first, P6 devours the crash, and P5 empowered-resurrects all.

artifacts.title: REFERENCE_OBSIDIAN_WEB_JADC2_MOSAIC_SOP_V1
artifacts.bluf: JADC2/MOSAIC SOP reskin of the Obsidian Web. P4 acts as EW/SIGINT (the Song) and P5 as Cyber Defense/Recovery (the Dance).
